title: Stuck in low priority que
body: I passed the 5 match low priority que thing for going afk in a match and i have played 8 matched games. But i am still stuck in the low priority que and am really confused why. Please help

replies.body:
Hey everybody,

Just wanted to let you guys know we are aware of games not counting towards completing the lower priority penalties. We're working to resolve this issue. Thanks for the reports!

Why even implement such a buggy system? infinite que loop.....games not counting towards the que being lifted...4.21 connection issues...etc. Also. we suffer through all of this to play our favorite game but you wont disable the program till its fixed and we are probably not going to be compensated in anyway, are we? Just another "tough luck" scenario where we have to suffer through it :(

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1agWkaum,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2014-12-18T01:12:52.729+0000)
>
> Hey everybody,
> 
> Just wanted to let you guys know we are aware of games not counting towards completing the lower priority penalties. We're working to resolve this issue. Thanks for the reports!

54367

I've heard people talk about this for nearly 3 weeks now.  You aren't saying riot Finally noticed are you?  I know riot ignores it's own forum pretty bad but it's been talked about a good amount.
Wow, this was 2 years ago and Riot haven't done anything, I have the same problem and now its almost 2017{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I'm actually still stuck in mine as well and idk why... maybe servers bugged
mines done the same wont say how much time is left and riot hasnt even responded rofl this is seriously and outrage that we are getting punished basically for no reason past our time
Helpppp pls I love this game and this is making me not play helpppp

i cannot get out of this and i got the que because i was having network errors and my router shut off then after attempting to reconnect it said because i have abandon my team i am in a ow priorety que
i too hawe and sometimes its stuck and need to restart - and for thet i got 5 min low please fix it

Low priority que is total BS. My computer or internet has a problem  and I get low priority que after I try to fix it by restarting whatever is needed.

 punishment for no good reason.  

Actions and Consequences.. think about it riot. you fuked everyone who accidently has a problem and have no way to recourse for the unjustified penalty.

 Riot is filled with idiot developers looking to make $$$$$$$$$ and don't give two shits about what problems one might encounter.
same problem
Uhhhh. I'm confused as to why I'm in low priority que....I haven't left or afk'd in a match in the past year(I don't think I ever have tbh) but yet I'm in it for some reason...?
riot please fix this problem

I know its so annoying none of my friends play with me anymore and my time is 20 minutes Riot doesn't even care anymore and another thing is that I got put in that queue for no reason. Riot has the stupidest punishments ever ok ban me for a day or 2 but don't put me in a queue that I have to wait 20 minutes each I match I play. I swear if Riot doesn't fix this oooohhh they will be hearing from me very soon.

So this is what I received on this situation. Let's hope this bug will be removed quickly
Phoenix (Riot Games Player Support)
Dec 17 09:45
,

We're investigating an issue with the new LeaverBuster system. While we don't currently have a solution, we need as much information as we can gather to get to the bottom of it. Would you kindly provide me with the following?

1) A Direct-X Diagnostic log: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq5

2) A list of your running processes: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq3

3) A Network Analysis: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq1

For Mac users:

1) System Report:
- https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jmq4

2) Network Analysis:
- https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jmq1

3) Process List:
- https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jmq3

Thank you for your help! As soon as there's an update on this, we'll let you know.

Phoenix
Riot Player Support Specialist
God luck with that. I've submitted about 2 tickets so far and they refuse to take me out of it even though I've done the 5 games...

I've had a friend in low priority queue for about 20 games now, and it won't let him out. His client locked up and he got kicked out of a game. It dropped him to low priority and now he's stuck there seemingly forever.

Same here, still stuck in "lower priority" queue. 

The more money riot makes the less they seem to care about their players.

Having lag issues, but I mean, I WAS pretty salty about it when I left, so I figure I deserve it to an extent but not past the initial 5 game punishment. My friends don't want to play with me when I have a 5 minute delay.

**I did my time Riot! I'm sorry! Let me out of this crap!**
Also getting leave buster issues with indefinite low priority. Tried contacted Technical Support but was not responded to in any fashion.

I got leaverbuster punished and I don't AFK or leave games unless it's out of my control (internet disconnecting). Needless to say, I didn't deserve leaverbuster punishment, and now I'm encountering the same issue as you.

So I got punished for no reason, and now I get punished indefinitely FOR NO REASON.

Come upvote my post. It's got a big picture, so maybe RITO will notice it over their beer-bellies covered with fRITO chips.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NKFwZK8g-getting-leaverbuster-punishment-for-no-reason-and-it-wont-go-away

I'm also experiencing connectivity issues and getting punished for leaving when it's out of my control.
Same with me 9 matches now . I don't understand why they have the message saying 5 matches when its obviously more then that
Yea I been stuck in it since yesterday I played like 15 games already and still stuck it's annoying please fix riot
I can't even get into a game with it, it gives me the 5 min wait. lol and says I have left the low priority queue
Bruhhhhh still stuck in mine and i've also played 8 games even though it was only suppose to be a 5 game penalty
I was disconnected due to Window update then I was put to the "20" mins AFK queue every game ... WTF.. at least shows a counter so I know how many unfair punishment I am going to wait.. riot sucks
